tasks.task: Verify design parameters for furrow irrigation systems through field trials.**
subtasks: ** Select a representative segment of the field (4-5 furrows) for observation.
** Choose a range of stream sizes (extreme low to high) for furrow irrigation.
** Measure elapsed time for water front advance from upstream to downstream.
** Plot advance curves for different stream sizes and identify maximum allowable Q (non-erosive).
** Compare Q_max from empirical relationship with field trial results.
** Adjust field segment length iteratively to match Q_max using trial runs and iterative procedures.

tasks.task: Design level basin systems for low to moderate infiltration soils.**
subtasks: ** Determine area of basin for given stream size and soil type using design charts.
** Calculate desired net depth of infiltration using hydraulic models (Manning’s equation).
** Ensure distribution pattern efficiency (FAR) meets design criteria.
** Evaluate cutoff time (TCO) to prevent channeling and maintain D_max (ridge height).
** Verify results through trial runs considering advance time, cutoff time, and depth of flow.
